accessibility.title: Accessibility Features
accessibility.description: Neurolink is designed to be accessible for all users, including those with dyslexia.

screenReader.title: Screen Reader
screenReader.description: Our built-in screen reader helps users with reading difficulties. When enabled, you can use {{keyCommand}} on any text to have it read aloud.
screenReader.try: Try {{keyCommand}} on this text to hear it read aloud!

theme.title: Theme Options
theme.description: You can switch between light and dark themes using the theme toggle in the navigation bar. Dark mode can help reduce eye strain for some users.
